resources.string: Google Developer Student Clubs are university based community groups for students interested in Google developer technologies. Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome. By joining a GDSC, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community.

There are a number of benefits to joining a Google Developer Student Club. According to the Google Developers website, students can:
Grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment. Build solutions for local businesses and their community. Access community management training and technical knowledge to help them be better equipped to solve real-world problems. Gain experience by working on projects that solve real-world problems. Connect with other students interested in developer technologies at their college or university. Learn about a range of technical topics and gain new skills through hands-on workshops, events, talks, and project-building activities online and in-person. Advance their skills, career, and network.
